message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it has tremendous potential and I'm willing to make a fair offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $950000. What do you think?
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $900000. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm thinking of offering $825000 for the product. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Bob, I understand your concerns, but I'm still not willing to go below $875000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm offering it to you for $875000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your efforts, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm thinking of offering $820000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand that you're trying to make a deal, but I'm not willing to go below $850000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm offering it to you for $850000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
